scripts.fetch_recent_twilogs:reset: echo 0 > data/MY_TWILOGS_CSV_CURSOR; TZ=Asia/Tokyo node script/fetch_recent_twilogs.mjs; [ -n "$(git status --porcelain data/)" ] && git add data/ && git commit -m "ci: reset recent twilogs ($(date))"
scripts.fetch_recent_twilogs: TZ=Asia/Tokyo node script/fetch_recent_twilogs.mjs; [ -n "$(git status --porcelain data/)" ] && git add data/ && git commit -m "ci: fetched recent twilogs ($(date))"
